Entries.marriage.000: Hey, you! Just checking the kegs.$9#$b#See you later?$1
Entries.marriage.001: There's so much I need to get done!$1#$b#Good luck with the farm work at %farm! I got things situated here!$9
Entries.marriage.002: OoOoh. Visiting me while I'm working?$4#$b#*smooch*$9
Entries.marriage.003: Hey, silly. Thought I'd pick up groceries while running errands today.$4#$b#*smooch*$9
Entries.marriage.004: Hey, you! I'm visiting Emily today.$9#$b#She made a new sewing pattern!$4
Entries.marriage.005: Finally Friday!$4#$b#Isn't it great we can enjoy ourselves at the saloon like this?$9
Entries.marriage.006: Soooo much work to do...$0#$b#Um. Is your farm work done for the day?$1
Entries.marriage.007: I'm happy my parent's underground sprinkler system still works.#$b#Watering the grape trellis would take forever...$2
Entries.marriage.008: Oh no! You caught me farming...$4#$b#Um. I'll see you later, alligator!$1
Entries.marriage.009: Soooo hungry. Want to get some lunch soon?$1#$b#Gus is working today. He probably has Grampleton orange chicken!$9
Entries.marriage.010: These kegs look good. Onto the next!$1
Entries.marriage.011: Hey! I'll see you later at the house, okay?$1#$b#Love you!$1
Entries.marriage.012: Getting a little dirty from working on the grape trellis...$2#$b#Want to shower together tonight?$1
Entries.marriage.013: Hey, you!$1#$b#I love it when you visit me while I'm working!$4
Entries.marriage.014: Done with work today! Meet you back at the farmhouse?$1
Entries.marriage.015: Hey, you! Just grabbing gardening tools from my storage chest.$1
Entries.NightMarket.001: I might buy a painting from this man in the fancy suit.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Sophia: Oh my gosh, I don't know who keeps the manga collection up here to date, but I HAVE to come check it out more often!$1
There are a few areas for crops outside this place...I wonder if they'd let me plant a little flower garden.$1
Hmm? Oh, I - I'll join the others in a little while.$2#$b#I just get a tiny bit overwhelmed by this many people all in one place.$0
I donated a few bottles of Blue Moon wine to the town for this event.$1#$b#It's not much, but I hope that people enjoy it!$9

Entries.CommunityDay_Sophia_Married: You made sure this place was stocked with all of my favorite manga, didn't you? You big sweetie.$1
We should fill this place with flowers from our farm!$1
Would you mind standing a little extra close to me...?$2#$b#Being around this many people always makes me a little anxious.$1
I donated a few bottles of our special wine to the town for this event.$1#$b#There's lots of love from both of us here.$9

Entries.funLeave_Sophia: I don't like Joja Day...$2#$e#It just... reminds me of too much.$2
